posts.post_title: T206 Gus Dorner Portrait - BVG 6.5 EX-MT+ SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Trae R.
SOLD
SOLD
SOLD

I bought this card on eBay a few days ago, but after seeing it I don't have the brass to cross it over, as I originally planned. I am afraid the top could be trimmed, but I don't know. The original seller made no mention but it came with the "all sales are final" approach.

Pop is only 1 higher according to seller.

This sale is final as well, but at least I had the courtesy to mention my opinion of the card. Obviously if it crosses to a 6 even you're doing just fine. The weird stuff on the image below is from my scanner reflecting on the holder, sorry... it is a super clean card.

You be the judge.

$150, free shipping. (OPEN TO OFFERS)
trae@t206.org

Thanks
